search_results.title: Who Will Win ‘Big Brother’ Season 27? Here’s What the Odds Say
search_results.text:
Sara Mally/Michael Yarish/CBS 
 
 
 
 Season 27 of Big Brother is halfway over, but 11 out of the 17 houseguests still remain. Some players are still floating their way through, while others have dominated the competition. Alliances have crumbled, twists have been introduced, and some big moves have been made. 
 Who will ultimately win remains to be seen, but those placing bets already have strong opinions. Fanduel Sportsbook, best known for daily fantasy sports and one of the most widely used online sportsbooks in the United States, conducted a study on who is most likely to win at this point in the game. 
 Ava Pearl comes out on top with 3-1 odds (+300). She won Head of Household in week four and got out Zach Cornell. She has also managed to avoid the block until week six. Her name is really not in anyone’s mouth, so the odds look pretty good for her. 
 In second place is Rachel Reilly with 4.7-1 odds (+470). Being the only veteran in a cast of newbies is hard, but Rachel makes

search_results.title: Big Brother 27 Early Predictions: Who Has a Shot at the ...
search_results.text:
Big Brother 27 is in full swing. The houseguests have moved past pleasantries and are now in full-on game mode. Twists are active, powers are unlocked, and alliances have been formed. It’s still early on, but a few houseguests have piqued the interest of fans, whether it be because they won a challenge or impressed fans with their strategic gameplay. 
 Let’s dive into the current Big Brother 27 frontrunners. 
 Who will win Big Brother 27 (BB27)? 
 Photo Credit: Flemming/CBS via Getty Images 
 Winning Big Brother is not an easy feat. To take home the $750,000 grand prize, a player must carefully maneuver the social dynamics in the house. It’s a tricky balance. You want to gain the respect of your fellow players, but you don’t want to become a threat and risk eviction. There are a few BB27 players that I believe already squandered their chance at victory. Kelley, girl, stop volunteering yourself for the block. PAWNS GO HOME! Have we learned nothing from 27 seasons of this show? And Kea

search_results.title: Big Brother 27 Cast Assessment and Season Predictions
search_results.text:
After a small wait, Big Brother 27 is finally here. 16 new houseguests and RACHEL REILLY are fighting for the BB27 crown, and to be honest, this is a pretty exceptional cast. So, let's take a look at each player. I'll give my thoughts on how I feel about each houseguest's chances in the game, their strengths, their current position in the game, and ultimately who I think is in the best position to win it all. Plus, as a bonus, I'll also give out some overarching season predictions too!

[5 comments](https://www.realityblurred.com/realitytv/2025/07/bb27-e10-will-winning/#comments)Categories [Big Brother 27](https://www.realityblurred.com/realitytv/topic/big-brother/big-brother-27/)Tags [reality TV show recaps](https://www.realityblurred.com/realitytv/tags/recap/)

Look, **Big Brother 27** is a snoozefest right now, because everyone is scared to play, and **Big Brother** has 90 minutes to fill, hence _The Bad Guys 2_ product placement that seemed low-rent even for our favorite summer dumpster fire.

I know the real entertainment is on the feeds, and as a bonus, they don’t have anyone screaming lines over and over in the Diary Room until they sound scripted. (By the way, here’s [why people

metadata.title: Who will win Big Brother 27 (US)?
metadata.description:
[Big Brother](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Brother_\(franchise\)) is a reality television show originally created in 1999, in which several contestants are isolated from the outside world and live together in an especially made house. During the show, contestants are constantly monitored through several cameras and microphones placed around the house, with live feeds aired throughout the day. Over the course of a season, players compete in physical and mental challenges for prizes and powers, and each week, ultimately vote for another player to be evicted and to leave the game.

The [American edition](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Brother_\(American_TV_series\)), first airing in 2000, spans 27 seasons, with the most recent season, [Big Brother 27](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Brother_27_\(American_season\)) celebrating the 25th anniversary. Premiering July 10, 2025 and set to end September 28, 2025, this season features a murder mystery theme, a \$750,000 grand prize, and a record 17 players. As of September 1, 2025, 7 players have already been evicted.

metadata.resolution_criteria: This question will resolve as the person who wins [Big Brother 27 (US)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Brother_27_\(American_season\)).
metadata.fine_print: If someone other than one of the listed individuals wins, there are multiple winners, there is no winner, the season has yet to conclude before 2026 or any other unexpected scenario that prevents resolution occurs, this question will be annulled.
